name: Automatic Loan System
description: This bundle of laws all work together to allow an automatic loan request with automatic repayments.

properties.Title: One Day Loan
properties.UserDescription: This law allows for the auto transfer of 24 hours worth of ubi (720 euros) to a direct citizen of St. Louis who is requesting it. The account the loan pulls from must have over 1000 euros and the citizen can not have another loan active. Additionaly, once a loan is paid off, the citizen still must wait till the current loan + 24 hours have passed to request another loan.

properties.Title: Two Day Loan
properties.UserDescription: This law allows for the auto transfer of 48 hours worth of ubi (1440 euros) to a direct citizen of St. Louis who is requesting it. The account the loan pulls from must have over 2000 euros and the citizen can not have another loan active. Additionaly, once a loan is paid off, the citizen still must wait till the current loan + 24 hours have passed to request another loan.

properties.Title: Three Day Loan
properties.UserDescription: This law allows for the auto transfer of 48 hours worth of ubi (1440 euros) to a direct citizen of St. Louis who is requesting it. The account the loan pulls from must have over 2000 euros and the citizen can not have another loan active. Additionaly, once a loan is paid off, the citizen still must wait till the current loan + 24 hours have passed to request another loan.

properties.Title: Automatic Loan Repayment
properties.UserDescription: The following law handles the automatic loan repayment. Every hour that you have an active loan, 16.5 will be taxed from your account. 15 of it will be applied to your remaining loan ammount while the 1.5 is interest.

RepeatForEachCitizen.name: Citizens of The Federation of White Tiger

properties.Title: Early Repayment
properties.UserDescription: This law enables citizens who have an active loan to repay it back early. Doing so will get not cause interest to apply to the amount paid. It is encuraged that you repay the loan back early.

properties.Title: Loan Information
properties.UserDescription: This law allows users who have an active loan to see the information related to it.

properties.Message: Amount left to pay off your loan:

properties.Title: Forced Loan Repayment
properties.UserDescription: This law forces a loan repayment of the remaining amount when the citizen leaves the settlement. Interest is applied to this repayment.

List.contextDescription: Is the citizen becoming a direct citizen, or are they becoming a citizen of a child settlement?
